titles.title: Livestock Indemnity Program Improvement Act of 2024
Livestock Indemnity Program Improvement Act of 2024
To require the Secretary of Agriculture to provide regular updates to Livestock Indemnity Program payment rates to reflect market prices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit
